name: Psycho Watch
description:
Use arrow keys or WASD to move.  Make the rounds by collecting clocks.  The patients will not harm you when the lights are on, they'll try to kill you when the lights are out.  You cannot collect clocks when the ligths are out. The patients cannot see you in the dark, but will find you if they bump into you.  You can use your flashlight [F] to help you, but it can also give your position away.  If the lights go out find the switch to turn the lights back on.  Collect 10 clocks and your watch is over.

Press [R] at any time to restart.
